MonsterTrait.Name: Heated Body
MonsterTrait.Text: A creature that touches the salamander or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Heated Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: Any metal melee weapon the salamander wields deals an extra 3 (1d6) fire damage on a hit (included in the attack).

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The salamander makes two attacks: one with its spear and one with its tail.

MonsterAction.Name: Spear
MonsterAction.Text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft./60 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage, or 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack, plus 3 (1d6) fire damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Tail
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) fire damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC 14).
